name: definable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is definable, you can explain and describe its meaning and exact limits: definable rules of grammar/syntax Your office must be a clearly definable space in which no personal activities take place.
If a word or phrase is definable, you can say what the meaning of it is: For every definable term in international law there are clear cases and more complicated cases. The Book Talker has eight hundred and forty-six definable phrases. See
define
More examplesFewer examplesIt is a mistake to see suffering as having a definable cause.No definable set of conditions can be presented as responsible for this growth.Abuse is not easily definable.
